sentences.en: He did not appear to resent it.
I deeply resent the insinuation that I'm only interested in the money.
sentences.cn: 我对他人旁敲侧击地说我只对金钱感兴趣十分反感.

sentences.en: I resent being dependent on her.
sentences.cn: 我很讨厌自己对她的依赖。

sentences.en: I resent being told to wash my face when visitors are present.
sentences.cn: 我恨有客人来时让我洗脸.

sentences.en: I resent comments on the impracticality of small cars.
sentences.cn: 我反对说小骄车不实用的说法.
我对整个生意情况感到不快.

sentences.en: I resent your implication that my work is unsatisfactory.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌你这话的弦外之音,似乎我的工作不能令人满意.

sentences.en: It is only natural that he should resent you.
sentences.cn: 他怨恨你是很自然的事。

sentences.en: Many conscripts resent having to do their military service.
sentences.cn: 许多应征入伍者对被迫服兵役愤愤不平。

sentences.en: Para-doxically, the less you have to do the more you may resent the work that does come your way.
sentences.cn: 矛盾的是，你手头的事越少，一旦有工作落在头上，你就越会愤愤不平。

sentences.en: Paul resented the fact that Carol didn’t trust him.
sentences.cn: 保罗非常气愤，因为卡萝尔不信任他。

sentences.en: She resents her mother for being so tough on her.
sentences.cn: 她恨她的妈妈对她如此苛刻。

sentences.en: The other White House aides resent interference in their spheres.
sentences.cn: 其他的白宫助理不喜欢别人干涉他们所管的事.

sentences.en: They resent what they see as bossiness.
sentences.cn: 他们对自己眼中那些专断蛮横的行为非常厌恶。

sentences.en: They seemed to resent the cross - examinations .
sentences.cn: 他们似乎憎恶这种 盘问.

sentences.en: We resent your insistence that the debt ( should ) be paid at once.
sentences.cn: 我们对你执意让人立即偿还债款的要求感到气恼.

words.tran_cn: 冒犯,对...感到不高兴,怨恨

trans.tran_en: to feel angry or upset about a situation or about something that someone has done, especially because you think that it is not fair

trans.tran_cn: 对…感到愤怒，怨恨，愤恨，厌恶
trans.tran_en: to feel angry or upset about a situation or about something that someone has done, especially because you think that it is not fair
